unparsed_output:
To determine the date of the board meeting with the fewest number of directors present, we need to examine the "Details of Board Meetings during the financial year" section. This table provides information on the number of directors present at each board meeting.

**Transcribed Data:**

| Sl. No. | Date | Board Strength | No. of Directors present |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | 17th May, 2013 | 18 | 15 |
| 2 | 25th July, 2013 | 18 | 17 |
| 3 | 26th July, 2013 | 18 | 17 |
| 4 | 28th August, 2013 | 15 | 13 |
| 5 | 25th October, 2013 | 15 | 15 |
| 6 | 17th January, 2014 | 15 | 14 |

**Answer:**

The fewest number of directors present at any board meeting was **13** directors, which happened on **28th August, 2013**.
